name: I Love My Sheep
description:
NOTE: PRESS "TAB" TO GO TO TITLE IN THE END, NOT "BACKSPACE"

A cute crafting game about staying alive in wake of an ever hungry god. Stay alive as long as you can and appease your god!

Craft a menagerie of buildings, a plethora of kooky collectibles, and appease your lord and saviour!

Survive his wrath as long as you dare, before his exotic demands get too high and you succumb.

 Includes:

  • Lots of sheep
  • A cute cultist boy
  • A murderous god
  • Trees and rocks
  • Plenty of crafting stations, resources and tools!
